Origin: Set lyrics to start from the first note. (Up to XXX notes)
Trans: 从开头音符开始设置歌词。(最大XXX音符)

Origin: Set lyrics to start from the selected note. (Up to XXX notes)
Trans: 从选中的音符开始设置歌词。(最大XXX音符)
要解除音轨的固定状态吗？

Origin: Invalid sampling rate. Please change the host sampling rate to 48,000 Hz.
Trans: 不支持的采样率。请将宿主的采样率设置为48000 Hz。

Origin: The notes in the first bar will not play. Please make changes.
Trans: 开头小节的音符不会被播放。请修正此问题。

Origin: The MIDI of the section to be played is sent to the plugin.
Trans: 将播放区间对应的MIDI\n发送到插件。
要保存当前编辑的内容吗？

Origin: Error occurred while opening audio device.
Trans: 打开音频设备时发生错误。
显示/隐藏全局参数面板

Origin: Are you sure you want to reset all the key-mappings to their default state?
Trans: 确定要将所有快捷键设置恢复到初始状态吗？

Origin: The limit on the number of PCs that can be authenticated has been reached.
Trans: 激活的客户端数量已达上限。

Origin: Click on the account page to delete the device and then try again.
Trans: 请在官网账号页面删除不需要的设备后，再试一次。

Origin: By fixing the process, CPU usage can be reduced.
Trans: 预合成音轨并禁止修改，\n以降低CPU占用率。
删除声源文件时发生错误。

Origin: Press the Download button in the list of voice libraries to download the voice library.
Trans: 点击声源库界面中的下载按钮来下载声源。

Origin: If the downloaded voice library fails to load, press the Delete button to delete the voice library and then try downloading it again.
Trans: 如果已下载的声源加载失败，点击删除按钮，然后尝试重新下载。

Origin: Return to Start Position when Stopped
already exists.\nDo you want to replace it?

Trans: 在调整界面也显示网格线
